Translations.Text: Inna: "ayagi d aeunu s$uo Mass iw. Mi d tusa lemaahda n Mass iw, a t Isawi. Lemaahda n Mass iw d tidep
Assen, a ten Neoo ad ddehmen wa $ef wa. Auuvu di lbuq, d$a a ten Nessemlil akw
A d Nessken nezzeh Loahennama, assen, i ijehliyen
wid iwumi seurrment wallen nnsen, mgal asmekti W. Llan ur zmiren i usemees
Day $ilen, wid ijehlen, ad rren imdanen iW, d imawlan war Nek? Ih, Nhegga Loahennama, d axxam i ijehliyen
Ini: "ad awen mle$ at igiten imexsuoen sennig wiyav
Wid iwumi iweddeo laatab nnsen di tmeddurt n ddunit, wanag nitni nwan gerzen igi
Widak d wid i inekoen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, akked temlilit yideS. Mean igiten nnsen. Ur ten Nwezzen, ass n tnekra
Atan uqeiii nnsen: Loahennama, imi jehlen, u mmaalken deg issekniyen iW, akked imazanen iW
Ma d wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, axxam nnsen d leonanat n Loennet
Degs ad wekkoen, ur ssuturen ayen nniven
Ini: "lemmer ill d lmidad, i wawalen n Mass iw, ad iqqao yill, uqbel ad fukken wawalen n Mass iw, xas a d nawi i t icban n lmidad
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weeean iyi d ar Oebbi nnwen, d Oebbi Yiwen. Win issaramen timlilit n Mass is, ad ixdem ayen ilhan, ur ipcarak yiwen deg waabad n Mass is
